trends: There have been no other sightings in Kearney
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Stationary right red star-like object in the southern sky that changed color then moved, shrunk then disappeared
divs: sighting detailsi was driving south to my home from a friend's house in kearney, nebraska and noticed a bright red star-like object between the moon and a very bright star\planet to the west. the object was the largest star-like object in the sky. it was bright red. i pulled off the street and called my friend to see if he would confirm what i was seeing. as he was starting to go outside, it turned white then moved to the east. as it moved it shrunk and dissappeared. it had been stationary. i have never seen anything like it and i am a somewhat regular star gazer. there were no clouds in the sky and i noticed it immediately when i started heading south. at first, i thought it was a star or planet, but it seemed too red. there was no flashing like a plane or helicopter. i have considered whether it might be a meteor or something, but it went from being stationary to moving to the east. i don't know what would cause a trajectory change like that if it was a meteor. i was amazed!
